name: SupportFranzGilliamA
_source: s;Gilliam;Well, Franz, it looks like there's a lot I can learn from Renais.
s;Franz;Why the change of heart, Sir Gilliam?
s;Gilliam;I've been doing your exercises every night, and I feel fantastic.
s;Gilliam;I appreciate Renais much more, thanks to you.
s;Franz;Really?{br}I'm glad.|I'm thrilled that the great Sir Gilliam approves of the training in Renais.

s;Franz;No, honestly! I am thrilled. It's a small thing, I know...|But when someone recognizes the fine qualities of Renais, I get a thrill.|Renais is a small country, but it contains much that is good.
s;Gilliam;I don't know Renais, but I do know how you feel as a fellow knight.|The more we are away, the more we think back on our beloved homeland.
s;Franz;I'm glad that I'm not alone in this.
s;Gilliam;Chin up, lad. Be proud of your country, Franz, Knight of Renais.|As your friend from neighboring Frelia, I'm glad you're proud of your home.
s;Franz;Yes, Sir Gilliam! Thank you very much!
